    • Class jromp.var.ReductionVariable

      class ReductionVariable extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • merged
          boolean merged
          Indicates whether the reduction variable has been merged.
        • threadLocalValues
          Map<Long,jromp.var.InternalVariable<T extends Serializable>> threadLocalValues
          The private variables that are used to reduce the result. Each thread has its own private variable.
        • threadNames
          Map<Long,String> threadNames
          The names of the threads that have accessed the reduction variable.

      • Serialized Fields

        • atomicVariable
          AtomicVariable<T extends Serializable> atomicVariable
          The atomic variable representation of the shared variable. This is used when the shared variable is converted to an atomic variable.
